definition[0]: plants such as wheat, barley, and oats or their seeds
example[1]: an ear of corn  (=the top part of this plant where the seeds grow)
definition[1]: a tall plant with large yellow seeds that grow together on a cob (=long hard part), which is cooked and eaten as a vegetable or fed to animals
example[2]: All our chickens are fed on corn.
definition[3]: a painful area of thick hard skin on your foot
